summary: This bill, the "Containing and Limiting the Extensive Abuses Noticed in Free Trade Zones Act of 2025" (CLEAN FTZ Act), mandates the Commissioner of U.S. Customs and Border Protection to identify and classify foreign free trade zones based on their compliance with international standards and their efforts to counter illicit international trade. It outlines a tiered system for classifying countries with such zones and allows for sanctions, including visa restrictions and asset freezes, against foreign persons involved in illicit activities within those zones. It also authorizes funding for implementation and outlines review processes.
